titles.title: Genetically Engineered Salmon Labeling Act
Genetically Engineered Salmon Labeling Act
A bill to amend the market name of genetically altered salmon in the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Genetically Engineered Salmon Labeling Act
This bill requires the market name of genetically engineered (commonly called genetically modified or GMO) salmon to include Genetically Engineered or GE in front of the existing market name.
